author: gsingers
msg: Initial check in of scoring.xml documentation.  I have also added lucene.css stylesheet and included it in the Anakia Site VSL, although I am open to other ways of including style information on a per document basis (I just don't know Velocity to make the changes).
I have not linked in scoring.xml to the main documentation yet, as I wanted others to proofread/edit before making it official.  Once it is official, I will hook it in via the projects.xml

author: mrglavas
msg: More bug fixes from Hua Lei.
To make sure the AsyncSAXParser thread terminates correctly the following modifications were made.
1) When an exception occurs in the next() method the AsyncSAXParser thread is interrupted because
after that no call to the XMLStreamReader is valid.
2) When an exception occurs in other methods of XMLStreamReader, a call to the XMLStreamReader may
still be valid, so the AsyncSAXParser thread shouldn't be interrupted in this case.
3) In the close() method, if the AsyncSAXParser thread is still alive, interrupt it.
The namespace management code has been reorganized to prevent NamespaceContextImpl's stack from underflowing.
